statements: SELECT * FROM vehicles
SELECT vehicle_type, manufacturer, year FROM vehicles
SELECT manufacturer, model, mileage FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota'
SELECT vehicle_id, model, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicles
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY manufacturer ASC
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE mileage < 50000 ORDER BY manufacturer DESC, year ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, manufacturer FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV' AND year >= 2010 AND mileage < 80000
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE manufacturer IN ('Toyota', 'Honda', 'Ford') ORDER BY manufacturer, model
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE last_maintenance_date = '2021-08-15'
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data;
SELECT vehicle_name, mileage FROM vehicle_data ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_type, fuel_consumption FROM vehicle_data WHERE mileage > 50000;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT vehicle_name, maintenance_date FROM vehicle_data INNER JOIN maintenance_logs ON vehicle_data.vehicle_id = maintenance_logs.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_consumption FROM vehicle_data ORDER BY fuel_consumption DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM vehicle_data JOIN maintenance_logs ON vehicle_data.vehicle_id = maintenance_logs.vehicle_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT vehicle_name, mileage FROM vehicle_data WHERE mileage > 50000 AND fuel_consumption < 25;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck' AND fuel_consumption BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_tracking ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_type, mileage FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE fuel_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM driver_tracking WHERE total_distance_travelled > 1000 ORDER BY total_hours_driven ASC;
SELECT driver_name, last_login FROM driver_tracking WHERE total_hours_driven < 50;
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location FROM route_tracking WHERE average_speed > 60 ORDER BY distance_covered DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT driver_name, total_distance_travelled FROM driver_tracking WHERE total_distance_travelled > 10000;
SELECT route_id, origin_location, end_time FROM route_tracking WHERE distance_covered > 500 AND average_speed > 60;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_level FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE fuel_level < 0.5 ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, last_login FROM driver_tracking ORDER BY last_login DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicles
SELECT brand, model, year FROM vehicles
SELECT * FROM trips
SELECT trip_id, start_time, end_time, distance FROM trips
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, cost FROM maintenance
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY brand ASC, model DESC
SELECT vehicle_type, brand, model FROM vehicles WHERE brand='Toyota' OR brand='Honda'
SELECT brand, model, AVG(fuel_consumption) AS avg_fuel_consumption FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY brand, model
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, cost FROM maintenance WHERE cost > 5000
SELECT trips.trip_id, trips.start_time, trips.end_time, vehicles.brand, vehicles.model FROM trips INNER JOIN vehicles ON trips.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE color = 'Red';
SELECT driver_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM drivers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM trips WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, technician, maintenance_type, cost FROM maintenance_records WHERE cost < 500 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Honda';
SELECT model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT make, color, mileage FROM vehicles WHERE color LIKE 'Blue%' AND make <> 'Toyota';
SELECT v.make, m.maintenance_type, m.cost FROM vehicles v JOIN maintenance_records m ON v.vehicle_id = m.vehicle_id;
SELECT d.first_name, d.last_name, t.start_location, t.end_location, t.distance FROM drivers d JOIN trips t ON d.driver_id = t.driver_id ORDER BY t.distance DESC;
